message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1,000,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I agree that the product looks promising, but $800,000 is a bit steep for me right now.  How about $500,000? That seems fair given the potential value.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $500,000. Considering the product's value to you is $1,000,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $700,000. This is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this. While $700,000 is closer, it's still a big jump for me. To be honest, my budget caps out around $600,000. If you can make that work, I'm ready to close the deal today.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to work with you. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $600,000. Considering the product's value to you is $1,000,000, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm offering it to you for $650,000. This is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, you're getting closer! I can tell we both want to make this work.  How about we split the difference at $625,000 and call it a deal?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $625,000. Considering the product's value to you is $1,000,000, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm offering it to you for $675,000. This is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, this is getting down to the wire. I'm willing to go up to $640,000, but that's my absolute limit. If we can't agree on this, I'm afraid I'll have to explore other options.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to go up to $640,000. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. Considering the product's value to you is $1,000,000, I'm willing to make a slight adjustment. I'm offering it to you for $680,000. This is a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
